text: GVC may refer to: * Den Haag Centraal railway station, in The Hague, Netherlands * Gasconade Valley Conference, an American high school athletic conference * Gastrovascular cavity * Genesee Valley Conservancy, an American land trust * Girls Venture Corps Air Cadets, in the United Kingdom * Global value chain * Government Victoria College, Palakkad, Kerala, India * Great Valley Center, in California, United States * GVC Holdings, a Manx gambling company * Wanano language, spoken in Brazil and Colombia
title: GVC
